meanings.definition: The study of the structure of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: In neuroanatomies, scientists examine how the brain and nerves are connected.
meanings.sent2: She learned about neuroanatomies in her biology class.
meanings.sent3: The detective's neuroanatomies skills helped him solve the mystery of the missing nerve.
meanings.sent4: His deep understanding of neuroanatomies allowed him to navigate the complex pathways of the brain.
meanings.sent5: Studying neuroanatomies is like solving a puzzle of the nervous system.

meanings.definition: The anatomical structure of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: The neuroanatomies of the brain include the cerebellum and brainstem.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the neuroanatomies to understand brain injuries better.
meanings.sent3: The artist's painting depicted the intricate neuroanatomies of the spinal cord.
meanings.sent4: The neuroanatomies of the nervous system resemble a complex network of roads and highways.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the neuroanatomies of the brain reveals its fascinating complexity.
